## Description {#details}

BTF&#95;KIND&#95;DATASEC are followed by multiple &quot;struct BTFDataSecVar&quot;.

The exist number of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/btf/btfdatasec">BTFDataSec</a> is stored in the vlen (of the info in &quot;struct CommonType&quot;).

Definition at line 216 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/btf/btf-h">BTF.h</a>.
